sys_ui_message.message:
Due to technical reasons, the functionality to update dependants and beneficiaries on Workday has been temporarily suspended.
However, you may still update your beneficiaries on the [Pension Fund Member Web](https://www.alexforbes.com/za/en/global/home-global.html).
Alternatively you may complete [the form](https://oneintranet.intra.absa.africa/sites/ppsg/Forms/Absa%207234%20EX.pdf) and send it to [apf.nominations@alexforbes.comÂ ](mailto:apf.nominations@alexforbes.com). Please keep a copy for your personal records.
